Body: Looking for a systematic online step-by-step process to codify English words into vowel/consontant patterns (CVC, CVCe, CVVC, etc.) and the correct sound (long-vowel, short-vowel, blend, diagraph, etc.).
Title: Systematic means of transcribing words to vowel/consontant patterns

OwnerUser.AboutMe: Ask a question on the new Linguistics site on Stack Exchange.
